content.description: Directions: You will now listen a dialogue. Afterwards, you will be asked several questions about what you have just heard. Select the best answer to each question from among the four choices printed.

choices.label: Il se fâche contre sa fille.
Il s’engage à ne plus trop roler en voiture.
Il se montre plus conciliant envers sa fille.
Il décide de mieux s’informer des problèmes écologiques.

content.answer: Il se montre plus conciliant envers sa fille.

unit.text: 5: Factors That Affect the Quality of Life

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe the literal meaning of the text.
